name: n3ziniuka5/zf2-doctrine-tools
description: Zend Framework 2 Module that provides extended functionality to controllers/models/forms. Also includes some view helpers.

suggest.zendframework/zend-developer-tools: zend-developer-tools if you want to profile operations executed by the ORM during development
suggest.doctrine/migrations: doctrine migrations if you want to keep your schema definitions versioned
suggest.ext-intl: ext/intl for i18n features (included in default builds of PHP)
